scripts.build:android: npm run sync:android && cap build android
scripts.build:ios: npm run sync:ios && cap build ios
scripts.build:apk: npm run sync:android && cd android && gradlew assembleDebug
scripts.build:apk:release: npm run sync:android && cd android && gradlew assembleRelease
scripts.build:aab: npm run sync:android && cd android && gradlew bundleRelease
scripts.install:android: npm run sync:android && cd android && gradlew installDebug
scripts.run:ios: npm run sync:ios && cap run ios
scripts.clean: npm run clean:android && npm run clean:ios
